data.eml:eml: A New Genus and Species of Blind Sleeper (Teleostei: Eleotridae) from Oaxaca, Mexico: First Obligate Cave Gobiiform in the Western Hemisphere

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stephen J. Walsh, Prosanta Chakrabarty (2016): A New Genus and Species of Blind Sleeper (Teleostei: Eleotridae) from Oaxaca, Mexico: First Obligate Cave Gobiiform in the Western Hemisphere. Copeia 104 (2): 506-517, DOI: 10.1643/CI-15-275
